1.0.2.name: wordpress/content-finder
1.0.2.description: Quickly Add - Free Keyword Targeted Articles to your Wordpress Blog, all from your Word Press Admin Control Panel. Search our database of thousands of free to use content specific articles. Using our simple plug-in, you can now post any of the articles to your blog with just one click! Each article has been verifed by our editors for quality and ownership. Your are free to publish the article.
